0: Health insurance premiums "have almost doubled ... since 2000."
1: "Each year, 18,000 people die in America because they don't have health care."
2: Half of all personal bankruptcies in America "are caused by medical bills."
3: Her health care plan will cost $110-billion in the first year, which can be paid for with savings.
4: "Hillary stood up for universal health care when almost no one else would, and kept standing till 6-million kids had coverage."
